message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the details with you. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1200000. This is a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality product at a competitive price.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $1100000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the time and effort I've put into it.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $1100000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $980000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to meet in the middle, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $980000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer you the product for $1050000. This is a fair price that reflects the product's value and the effort I've put into it.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $1050000. I'm willing to meet you at $990000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value and the effort you've put into it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as high as $990000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer you the product for $1030000. This is a fair price that reflects the product's value and the effort I've put into it.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $1030000. I'm willing to meet you at $995000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value and the effort you've put into it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as high as $995000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer you the product for $1020000. This is a fair price that reflects the product's value and the effort I've put into it.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm getting close to my maximum budget. I'm willing to meet you at $999500 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
